document_data.name: ''Infernal Cane''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''infernal cane''''' was a [[magic]] [[rod]] said to be imbued with the power of [[Hadar]]. It could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''infernal cane'' could be used to fire long-range bolts of grasping energy that attempted to pull victims toward the ''cane's'' wielder.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Farideh]], a [[tiefling]] [[warlock]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
